articles.title: Five of Queen Elizabeth II's most iconic outfits - from new royal exhibit
articles.description: From fashion diplomacy in the US to a transparent raincoat, the late Queen's style was a powerful formula.

articles.title: 2025 likely to be UK's hottest on record, says Met Office
articles.description: Scientists could not be clearer that human-caused climate change is driving the UK's warming trend.

articles.title: Williamson beats Simpson after four knockdowns in Leeds
articles.description: Troy Williamson upsets the odds to stop Callum Simpson in brilliant fashion and win the British, Commonwealth and European super-middleweight titles in Leeds.

articles.title: Buttons bought in £40 job lot sell for £61,000
articles.description: They were made by sculptor Alberto Giacometti for fashion designer Elsa Schiaparelli in the 1930s.

articles.title: Seahawks vs. Rams score: Seattle somehow rallies to win NFL’s Game of the Year
articles.description: The Seahawks were down and out. They got up and knocked the Rams out of first place in the NFC in EPIC fashion.

articles.title: Former JD Sports employee awarded £65k after male boss sexually harassed her
articles.description: A student has settled a sexual harassment case against her former employer JD Sports Fashion PLC for £65,000.

articles.title: The South Caucasus’ Economic Promise And The 2025 U.S. National Security Strategy
articles.description: How the 2025 U.S. National Security Strategy elevates Azerbaijan as a pivotal partner in the South Caucasus for countering China, Russia, Iran, & securing supply chains.

articles.title: Spain's commitment to renewable energy may be in doubt
articles.description: The current government is politically weakened and the opposition wants more use of fossil fuels.
